## Viewing Color Palettes

```{r}
hcl.pals(type = "sequential")
hcl.colors(256, palette = "ag_sunset")

plot(0, 
     type = "n",
     axes = F,
     xlab = "", ylab = "",
     xlim = c(0, 1),
     ylim = c(0, 1),
     xaxs = "i",
     yaxs = "i",
     omi = rep(0, 4),
     oma = rep(0, 4),
     mar = rep(0, 4),
     frame.plot = F)
rect(0, .5, .8, 1, col = terrain.colors(256))

grid.newpage()
grid.raster(seq(0, 1, .01))
dev.off()
```

```{r}
# you can color the matrix directly as well, and generate the raster that way
redGradient <- matrix(hcl(0, 80, seq(50, 80, 10)),
                      nrow=4, ncol=5)

grid.newpage()
grid.raster(redGradient)
invisible(dev.off())
```
